DOC.brief_summary: Prospective study . Starting 2014 newly appoint 1st year cadet Naval Academies enrol class 2025 . Physical examination , food frequency questionnaire , physical activity questionnaire , anxiety/depression questionnaire , medical history fill first interview . Specific blood test perform . Every participant interview every three year complete questionnaire . Follow period determine ten year last class enrollment
DOC.brief_title: It Prospective Study Aiming Identify Incidence Prevalence Cardiovascular Diseases , Changes Physical Activity , Dietary Habits Anxiety Depression Levels Through Period Time Naval Personnel ( PrOspeCtive HEllenic NAval PersoNnel StUdy CardiovaScular Diseases )
